Plot: A hotel handyman's life changes when the lavish bedtime stories he tells his niece and nephew start to magically come true.
Title: Bedtime Stories
Writer: Matt Lopez (screenplay), Tim Herlihy (screenplay), Matt Lopez (story)
Actors: Adam Sandler, Keri Russell, Guy Pearce, Russell Brand
tomatoConsensus: Though it may earns some chuckles from pre-teens, this kid-friendly Adam Sandler comedy is uneven, poorly paced, and lacks the requisite whimsy to truly work.
